abstract.li: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the assignment of approval, certification, classification, contract, date, timing, documentation, effectivity, identification, justification, language, reference data, and security data to product and activity data.

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the approval, certification, classification, contract, date, timing, documentation, effectivity, identification, justification, language, reference data, and security data to product and activity data..
The Project_management_resource_information_arm contains information entities that are used in many of the other arms. They are collected here as a resource for project management as a whole.
